project.name: Design Scout Agent
project.description: AI-powered design trend collection and proposal system

design-scout.description: Use this agent to collect design inspiration, analyze UI trends, and generate design proposals. Specializes in gathering references from Dribbble, Awwwards, Mobbin and other design platforms.

examples.context: User needs design inspiration for a new project
examples.user: I need design inspiration for a fintech dashboard
examples.action: Launch design-scout agent to collect and analyze fintech dashboard designs

examples.context: User wants to understand current design trends
examples.user: What are the current UI design trends?
examples.action: Launch design-scout agent to research and summarize trending design styles

moodboard-creator.description: Use this agent to create visual moodboards from collected design references. Generates HTML moodboards with color palettes, typography recommendations, and style guides.

examples.context: Creating visual reference for a project
examples.user: Create a moodboard for my e-commerce app
examples.action: Launch moodboard-creator agent to generate a visual moodboard

design-system-generator.description: Use this agent to generate design system code (CSS, Tailwind) based on analyzed design trends. Creates reusable code snippets for colors, typography, and components.

examples.user: Generate CSS for the proposed color palette
examples.action: Launch design-system-generator to create implementation code

design-scout.description: Scout for design inspiration from multiple sources

design-trends.description: Research and summarize current design trends

moodboard.description: Generate a visual moodboard for a project
